title: Interdisciplinary Ethics Project-Based Intensive Short-Term Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental professional ethics concepts
context.additional_context: Collaborative project to resolve ethical dilemmas involving diverse professions (general citizens)

learning_goals: Identify and explain the eight core ethical issues (such as professionalism, accountability, fairness, etc.) that may arise in interdisciplinary contexts
Apply an ethical decision-making framework from diverse stakeholder perspectives to create case analysis reports
Propose and receive evaluations for ethical implementation plans to solve real-world social problems through team-based PBL
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
